com.atakmap.android.maps

Interface IReferenceLocation


  • public interface IReferenceLocation
    Interface for an item to use as a reference location

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GeoPoint getReferencePoint(GeoPoint point)
      Get the reference geo point of this item
      java.lang.String getReferenceTitle()
      Get the title of the reference geo point

    • Method Detail

      • getReferencePoint

        GeoPoint getReferencePoint(GeoPoint point)
        Get the reference geo point of this item
        Parameters:
        point - Mutable point
        Returns:
        Geo point or null if N/A. This lacks the associated metadata.

      • getReferenceTitle

        java.lang.String getReferenceTitle()
        Get the title of the reference geo point
        Returns:
        Title or null if N/A
